description: Looking for an easy wintry midweek meal? Go for our cosy chicken and corn soup recipe to master a warming Asian classic.
name: Chicken & Corn Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 corn cobs, husks and silks removed
2 free range egg whites, beaten lightly

recipeInstructions.text: Cut kernels from corn. Heat oil in a large non-stick saucepan over medium heat. Cook kernels, ginger, garlic and half the onion, stirring, for 2 minutes or until fragrant.

Add creamed corn, soy and stock, then bring to the boil. Add chicken. Reduce heat to low, simmer, uncovered, for 8 minutes or until hot. Gradually stir in egg white. Remove pan from heat. Divide soup among bowls and serve sprinkled with remaining onion.
